item.title: Bye bye, personal privacy
item.description: It is hard to stop devices tracking humans. Devices are everywhere, whether you want it or not. If you use a phone, you are going to get tracked. If you use Alexa, you are going to get tracked. If you use a Chromecast or Amazon fire TV stick, you are going to get tracked. If you have IoT devices, you are going to get tracked. If you live in a smart city with a ton of surveillance cameras, like London or Paris, you are going to get tracked.
